description:
Since 1988, over $4.3 billion has been shelled out in vaccine court for vaccine injuries (https://www.hrsa.gov/sites/default/files/hrsa/vaccine-compensation/data/data-statistics-report.pdf), & a study I was reading the other night showed that only 1-10% of vaccine injuries ever even get reported, for a variety of reasons. •

Rp: @chriskirckof:

If vaccines keep kids healthy....why are so many kids who are vaccinated unhealthy? •

If vaccines are so safe and vaccinating leads to healthy kids, why hasn't the government ever done a double blind placebo study to prove that? •

Why doesn't the pharmaceutical companies or CDC follow up with parents after vaccination to check on the health of the vaccinated children? •

Vaccines are effective....at causing neurological damage, autoimmune disorders, death and lining the pockets of the most immoral and inept people within our deranged society. •

There's only 2 people who believe vaccines are good....the person who's done ZERO research (the repeater) and the person who profits from this dysfunction (the coward). •

When someone says vaccines are ""safe and effective""...that's code for, ""I didn't do a damn bit of research and I let others think for me."" •
